tip.text: Nice outdoor "beach" like setting but come early for the nice spots in the sand. The cantina choices for food are alright and there are other restaurants nearby €€€€
Amazing Napoli style pizzas. The kitchen of the famous A Tavola is a shared space with this fantastic pizza place. Fresh Italian ingredients all the way!
Fancy to the dot! Competes with the best speakeasy bars of NYC. Worth waiting outside to be buzzed in. Bartenders can make anything taste just heavenly.

formattedAddress: Jean Stasstraat 24 Rue Jean Stas (Rue Dejoncker)

tip.text: Excellent presentation of their food and the staff is young and very knowledgeable. I had their Spanish cut and was not impressed for €75 per steak! Price and quality are out of balance here 🙁

formattedAddress: Jean Stasstraat 24 Rue Jean Stas (Rue Dejoncker)

tip.text: Apple pie like no other on earth! Super friendly staff and speedy service! Espresso drinks are a 9/10 as well!
Great classic cocktails with a Japanese twist. Delicious all round menu with a price tag to match. Portions are on the smaller side too but worth it! Sliders are a must

formattedAddress: Level 1, Souk Al Bahar, Burj Khalifa Area (Sheikh Zayed Rd)
location.address: Level 1, Souk Al Bahar, Burj Khalifa Area

formattedAddress: Level 1, Souk Al Bahar, Burj Khalifa Area (Sheikh Zayed Rd)
location.address: Level 1, Souk Al Bahar, Burj Khalifa Area

formattedAddress: Ground Floor, Jumeira Tower (Sheikh Zayed Road)
Armenia Street , Mar Mkhayel (Armenia Street , Mar Mkhayel)

venue.name: The Cheesecake Factory (ذا شيز كايك فاكتوري)
Beirut Rafic Hariri International Airport (BEY) (مطار رفيق الحريري الدولي)

tip.text: New boutique cocktail bar serves lots of sophisticated drinks. Huge selection of good wines by the glass and lots of 🍺 too if you fancy being dull
This monster burger delivers with every bite. Juicy smokey and huge for most jaws! Book ahead. Very busy
The place looks great and the waiters are very friendly so it compensates for their less than average burger. The beef has no real wow factor hence my disappointment
Very friendly staff. Build your breakfast plate as you like and be ready to indulge in great homemade eggs and lots of healthy sides.
Burgers are to die for. I would safely say they are the best in Copenhagen. The burger is extremely juicy and their choice of side dishes is just as appetizing.
Theeee place to have a burger. Thin patty and unfortunately they only grill well-done but juicy!

formattedAddress: Right at the end of Hamra's main street. (Main Street)
location.address: Right at the end of Hamra's main street.

tip.text: Top location for shopping. The hotel itself is nothing short of a 4 star. Very modern interior and the standard rooms are spacious. Breakfast is not a must as it is nothing mind blowing.

formattedAddress: 851 Avenue Of The Americas (btwn W 29th & W 30th St)

tip.text: The hillstone burger is to absolutely die for. One of the best in NYC. Juicy and full of flavor. The place itself is a nice venue to be in and the staff are quite friendly too.

Yes the black label burger is worth every cent. If you're adventurous ask for cheese on this monster. Bartenders know their cocktails so always a plus to sit by the bar. Book ahead as it's pretty busy
Stumptown beans fresh out of Portland give this busy coffee shop the kick it needs. Big choice of croissants and other baked goodies.
By far one of the best teppanyaki places in Hong Kong. Excellent service. I'd recommend bringing your own bottles of wine and let them charge cork service to save plenty of $$

formattedAddress: 3/F, Renaissance Hong Kong Harbour View Hotel, 1 Harbour Rd
location.address: 3/F, Renaissance Hong Kong Harbour View Hotel, 1 Harbour Rd

tip.text: Burgers are super for the Hong Kong standard but don't expect the miracle burger. All in all a good place to come for a quick bite.
Disappointed. The taste is quite bland. It lacks the charcoal burn and the bun is just off. The burgers are more like meat sandwiches in a round bun.

contact.facebookName: MO Bar at The Landmark Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong

formattedAddress: G/F, The Landmark Mandarin Oriental Hotel, 15 Queen’s Rd C
location.address: G/F, The Landmark Mandarin Oriental Hotel, 15 Queen’s Rd C

tip.text: NYC's best burger. Order two as the portion isn't huge!
Knowledgeable staff and super selection of cocktails. May get overcrowded but worth the wait! Cheers!
The meat, the bun, the whole burger was a wow experience. I'd also recommend the roasted beet salad as a starter. The whole menu looked delicious but you can't fit it all!
Pickled beetroot? Weak heart? BEST BURGER!
Steak tips are a 10/10 and so is the burger! It's made from the same delicious meat and grilled to perfection!
The selection on the menu is limited and may not appeal to all tastes. I felt that this place is a really top notch venue for lunch and not dinner.

formattedAddress: 35 E 18th St (btwn Broadway & Park Ave S)

tip.text: Great bartender! Old fashioned cocktails with a twist. Totally worth it.
The light beer is fantastic. I would go for their speciality chicken. It's a fantastic baby chicken with the proper spices and grill flavor!
The empire cheeseburger with cheddar! Order pink otherwise it's rubbery. Fries not as thick.
Very trendy hotel and easy going staff! Off route for new tourists!
Overrated! Paying 50% just for the name. Total disappointment!

formattedAddress: Stoofstraat 46 Rue de l'Etuve (Eikstraat / Rue du Chêne)
MELIÃ BALI, Kawasan Wisata BDTC Lot 1, Nusa Dua
location.address: MELIÃ BALI, Kawasan Wisata BDTC Lot 1, Nusa Dua
